overview: Baber takes place in a macabre barber shop against the backdrop of the Cape Flats' patriarchal value system. DÃ´nnie vanie Reevas comes in for a shave. Vikkah, the barber, recognizes him as the man who allegedly robbed and killed his only son. Donnie is in possession of his son's pocket watch. Mynie, the barber's daughter, is very skilled, but she is undermined by her father. Today, she has a client in the chair - the man who killed her brother.
title: Baber
